Comments_List: A general understanding of the immune system and current landscape of the research

The course was not very organized and there was a lot of material that I felt we didn't cover well. The powerpoints were hard to follow and it was clear which readings were assigned for what material. I did find what we did cover very interesting and this class is very unique and unlike other immunology classes at Yale. I think it needs to be better formatted and follow the syllabus more closely.

The instructor is disorganized. Lecture slides can be better organized into dates and topics. Currently, the lecture slides are grouped by big topics and one lecture slide deck would serve 3 lectures. It is hard to track what we have covered and what we have not.
I think this class will be great to take if it is better organized. Otherwise, it is difficult to get too much out of it.
